sentence.Network_en: This is the Asiatic ornamental shrub with spiny branches and pink or red blossoms.
sentence.Network_cn: 这就是亚洲的一种观赏灌木，具有多刺的枝和粉红色或红色的花。

sentence.Network_en: During October 1918 the Austro-Hungarian Empire began to disintegrate.
sentence.Network_cn: 在1918年10月间，奥匈帝国开始瓦解。

sentence.Network_en: In 1854 , a localized epidemic of Asiatic cholera broke out in London.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种地方性传染病――亚细亚霍乱于1854年在伦敦爆发.

means.word_mean: 1. a family of languages spoken in southn and southeastern Asia

auth_sentence.content: Mithridates was once more a petty Asiatic prince existing upon sufferance.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mithridates was once more a petty Asiatic prince existing upon sufferance.

auth_sentence.content: He made the rounds...dispensing rewards and punishments like an Asiatic grandee.
auth_sentence.res_content: He made the rounds...dispensing rewards and punishments like an Asiatic grandee.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He made the rounds...dispensing rewards and punishments like an Asiatic grandee.

auth_sentence.content: There were two leopards, two panthers, an Asiatic black bear and two macaque monkeys — all about the size of puppies.
auth_sentence.res_content: There were two leopards, two panthers, an Asiatic black bear and two macaque monkeys — all about the size of puppies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There were two leopards, two panthers, an Asiatic black bear and two macaque monkeys — all about the size of puppies.
